info.name: Topping Thief
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Pizza background is from http://www.freepik.com and used under the Freepik license: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/restaurant-mural-wallpaper-with-pizza_10290897.htm

All food graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Onion https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/bulb.html
* Mushroom https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/mushroom.html
* Cheese https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cheese-wedge.html
* Pepper https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/chili-pepper.html
* Sausage https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/sliced-sausage.html
* Full Pizza https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/full-pizza.html

Order and Checkmark icons are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji
info.description: Load toppings into a communal oven, and when the time is right, steal your rival cooks' toppings to create your own pizza!
info.similarAwards:
2000 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
1999 Spiel des Jahres Recommended
1999 Fairplay Ã€ la carte Runner-up
